segments.text: The water is just pouring over the edge of the sink, and she doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand how clueless she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are going to get hurt, and she won’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall off that stool, and the girl is just encouraging him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is practically empty now, and they’re still taking more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just turn off the faucet before the whole kitchen floods.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window is open, and the garden looks so nice, but inside, it’s a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just polishing that plate like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
